attributes.title: 🧚🏻‍♀️❤️✨

attributes.review: First of all, the app literally takes 17 hours to download. It took up 14 Terabytes of data despite the app’s description saying it is only a couple MB😡. I later found out that the 13.999 additional Terabytes was actually the NSA HACKING ME!!!! WARNING: DOWNLOADING THE APP IS YOU ACCEPTING AND ALLOWING THE GOVERNMENT TO HACK YOU!!! Snowden exposes the NSA and government for many things, but one of those things was that the NSA created fake Facebook servers in order to trick users into accepting a bunch of things, THEN they would download MALWARE on the persons laptop. This malware not only erased both the hard drive and software completely off the computer, it also allowed the NSA to take anything and everything on the computer. The government said that they had put a stop to the NSA doing such nasty things to their own people, but DONALD J. TRUMP is secretly working with the NSA to pursue this evil monitoring agenda and THIS APP IS PROOF!!! Basically, When the app downloaded, my ENTIRE PHONE WAS ERASED!!!! WHAT???? Not only that, but my ENTIRE WIFI NETWORK WAS HACKED- I literally loved Donald Trump (until this happened). It gets worse:The NSA used their Malware to TAP INTO MY WEBCAM ON MY COMPUTER WHILE THEY ERASED IT! They misread a “trump 2020” sticker I had on my wall as “drump 2020” which was seen as me disrespecting my dear president Donald j. Trump. THEN THEY F*CKING SENT KELLY ANNE-CONWAY (YES! THE KELLY ANNE-CONWAY) TO MY F*CKING HOUSE!!!!! She didn’t even knock, she just STORMED IN AND tore the sticker off my wall!! Before I could do anything, she football-punted my poor baby kitten sitting next to her INTO THE F*CKING CEILING FAN!!!! This, viewer discretion advised, caused the ceiling fan going full speed to chunk my baby kitten’s stomach guts across my house in all directions!! I was crying my eyes out so I couldn’t explain to Kelly that the sticker said “TRUMP 2020” and not “DRUMP 2020”. She said she was exhausted from purposely killing my kitten, so she decided to smoke a cigarette. I guess the NSA hadn’t seen that my house was fumigated for poisonous ticks earlier that day, so when she dropped the butt of the cigarette on the floor, my ENTIRE HOUSE BURSTED INTO FLAMES!!! LUCKILY I ESCAPED, and the evil Kelly did too, but I lost EVERYTHING. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP IT IS THE NSA WORKING WITH TRUMP TO DESTROY THE LIBT*RDS OF THE LEFT!!!!!!!
attributes.title: THE NSA HACKED ME THROUGH THIS APP AND KILLED MY CAT

attributes.review: Delete this app RIGHT NOW!! And in the meantime- if you support this man go f*ck urself.
attributes.title: Trump is a rapist 🤡

attributes.review: Long story. I got this app and right away it asked for my location, which isn’t a big deal. It then asked for my full name, my phone number, and my email. It even asked for my address! That’s a little excessive. Then next day I get a message from amazon saying my package has been delivered, but I haven’t ordered anything in the past month. Take this as a warning. If you get this app bad things will happen. It’s ALMOST like when you get an app that supports a racist, rapist, misogynous, and much more bad things will happen. I don’t know if this only happened to me but reading a few other reviews I think this is happening to everyone!
attributes.title: Will NOT get again.

attributes.review: Now I am a republican and used to be the biggest trump fan. But you mess with my tik tok and my generation. We tear yours down ;) get ready Trump #genzworld
attributes.title: F**k you Trump
